Articles.Content:
So, i had 800.000 ksp money and then i finished a entire mission, and i then i had about 1.000.000 ksp money,

after that i saw that i had only 200.000 and then i had 0 money.

What happened?

This bug totally destroys the game's experience.

(my os: windows 7)

______

Lucky me that i had 3 science satellites (my epic invests) on space around moons and so when you fix the bug i will finish small missions and i'll get some money. (cool huh?)

Edited June 7, 2015 by giannis1996
wanted to give more information

You can also edit the persistent.sfs to restore lost funds.

Back it up first just in case.

thanks sal_vager!

Well, actually i found the why this happened.

I right click it and i saw it write "this file comes from another computer and for safely it may block".

I clicked deny block and it didn't happened again.

problem solved!
